name: Theme Name
description: Short description of the theme's appearance or mood.

creator.name: Your display name or alias.
creator.contact: Link or username where you can be reached (Telegram, GitHub, etc.)

type: Theme style category (e.g., Material You, Light, Dark, OLED, Neon,etc).
features: (e.g., dynamic, gradient, high contrast, minimal, soft, pastel, etc)
preview: Direct URL to preview image or video.
date_created: Date the theme was first made (YYYY-MM-DD).
date_updated: Date the theme was last updated (YYYY-MM-DD).

style.font_primary: Primary text font available in tasker (e.g., SansSerif, Monospace, Serif).
style.font_secondary: Secondary text font available in tasker
style.image: Drawable resource or URL for background or decoration.
style.icon: Drawable resource for main icon or logo.
style.color_accent: Main accent color (Material token or hex code).
style.color_divider: Divider color (Material token or hex code).
style.color_outline: Outline or border color (Material token or hex code).
style.color_highlight: Highlight or focus color (Material token or hex code).
style.background_color: Main background color (Material token or hex code).
style.background_color_icon: Background color for icon (Material token or hex code).
style.text_color_event_title: Text color for event title (Material token or hex code).
style.text_color_event_date: Text color for event date (Material token or hex code).
style.text_color_event_alert: Text color for event alert (Material token or hex code).
style.text_color_event_days: Text color for event days (Material token or hex code).
style.text_color_event_label: Text color for event label (Material token or hex code).
